parameters.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS.M_LANDSCAPE_HOST_CONFIGURATION ORDER BY HOST_ACTIVE DESC, INDEXSERVER_ACTUAL_ROLE ASC
SELECT * FROM SYS.M_SYSTEM_OVERVIEW WHERE SECTION = 'System' OR SECTION = 'Services'

SELECT TIME AS _SERVER_LOCALTIME, LOCALTOUTC(TIME) AS _TIMESERIES_UTC, HOST AS HOST, MAP(CPU, null, -1 , -1, -1, ROUND(100 * CPU / 1) / 100) AS CPU, MAP(MEMORY_RESIDENT, null, -1 , -1, -1, ROUND(100 * MEMORY_RESIDENT / 1048576) / 100) AS MEMORY_RESIDENT, MAP(MEMORY_TOTAL_RESIDENT, null, -1 , -1, -1,  ROUND(100 * MEMORY_TOTAL_RESIDENT / 1048576) / 100) AS MEMORY_TOTAL_RESIDENT, MAP(MEMORY_SIZE, null, -1 , -1, -1, ROUND(100 * MEMORY_SIZE / 1048576) / 100) AS MEMORY_SIZE, MAP(MEMORY_USED, null, -1 , -1, -1, ROUND(100 * MEMORY_USED / 1048576) / 100) AS MEMORY_USED, MAP(MEMORY_ALLOCATION_LIMIT, null, -1 , -1, -1, ROUND(100 * MEMORY_ALLOCATION_LIMIT / 1048576) / 100) AS MEMORY_ALLOCATION_LIMIT, MAP(DISK_USED, null, -1 , -1, -1, ROUND(100 * DISK_USED / 1073741824) / 100) AS DISK_USED, MAP(DISK_SIZE, null, -1 , -1, -1, ROUND(100 * DISK_SIZE / 1073741824) / 100) AS DISK_SIZE, MAP(LAG(TIME) OVER (ORDER BY HOST, TIME) , null , -1,  MAP(SUBSTRING(CAST (NETWORK_IN as VARCHAR),0,1) ,'-', -1, 'n', -1,  ROUND( 10000000*( 100 * NETWORK_IN / (NANO100_BETWEEN(LAG(TIME) OVER (ORDER BY HOST, TIME), TIME) )) / 1048576) / 100)) AS NETWORK_IN, MAP(LAG(TIME) OVER (ORDER BY HOST, TIME) , null , -1, MAP(SUBSTRING(CAST (NETWORK_OUT as VARCHAR),0,1) ,'-', -1, 'n', -1,  ROUND( 10000000*( 100 * NETWORK_OUT / (NANO100_BETWEEN(LAG(TIME) OVER (ORDER BY HOST, TIME), TIME) )) / 1048576) / 100)) AS NETWORK_OUT FROM SYS.M_LOAD_HISTORY_HOST WHERE LOCALTOUTC(TIME) > {lastRunServerUtc} ORDER BY TIME ASC
SELECT HOST, PATH, SUBPATH, USAGE_TYPE, USED_SIZE, TOTAL_SIZE, TOTAL_DEVICE_SIZE FROM SYS.M_DISKS

SELECT EVENT_TIME AS _SERVER_LOCALTIME, LOCALTOUTC(EVENT_TIME) AS _TIMESERIES_UTC, * FROM M_SYSTEM_AVAILABILITY WHERE EVENT_NAME <> 'PING' AND LOCALTOUTC(EVENT_TIME) > {lastRunServerUtc} ORDER BY EVENT_TIME ASC
